Capabilities & Stack

I stabilize, harden, and accelerate production websites. I work in live environments — not just clean demos.

Security & Hardening
  • • SSL / HTTPS enforcement
  • • WAF & DDoS protection
  • • Secure headers (CSP / HSTS)
  • • Vulnerability patching & admin lock-down
Performance & Speed
  • • Core Web Vitals fixes (LCP / CLS)
  • • Asset & image compression
  • • Caching strategy (CDN / browser / server)
  • • API response tuning
Frontend Stack
  • • React / Next.js / Vue
  • • TypeScript / Tailwind CSS
  • • Accessibility & SEO best practice
  • • High-conversion responsive UI
Backend & Cloud
  • • PHP / Node.js / Express
  • • MySQL / phpMyAdmin / Prisma ORM
  • • AWS Lightsail & Lambda
  • • Secure deploy / rollback / monitoring

My Process

This is how I take you from "risky and slow" → "secure and fast" without taking your business offline.

1. Audit

Deep scan of security, performance, plugins, DNS, hosting, db access, backups.

2. Patch & Lock Down

Close vulnerabilities. Enforce SSL, WAF, restricted admin, secure headers.

3. Optimize Speed

Fix Core Web Vitals, caching, compression, asset delivery, TTFB.

4. Deploy & Monitor

Hardened production rollout with rollback plan and uptime watch.
